login.14days: or start you free 14 days trial

notifications.trainedSuccessfully: Your project {{ item }} has been trained successfully!

home.quickLook: Take a quick look to your weekly overview
home.changesOn: Changes on {{ label }} since last week

data.projectDataLabel: Now we collect data to create the project

train.lastStep: Last step to train a model
train.title: We are ready now to train our model!

retrain.fromDatabaseInfo: As you have trained the project from a database, retraining is much easier: you can configure how often you want to train it, we take care of finding new information in your database and the entire process. You simply choose a period.
retrain.fromCSVInfo: You can upload a CSV with new data (remember that you already know the old ones), as long as it maintains the same column structure as the previous one, and from that new data we will retrain the model.

create.saveConnection: Do you want to save the connection? If not, all data will be lost. Don't worry, all the data will be encrypted.

databases.connectedError: Something went wrong, check the credentials

database.takeAQuickLook: Take a quick look at the tables:
database.alreadyCreatedAProject: You already <1>trained a project</1> with this data

upgrade.title: To continue you need to upgrade your account!
upgrade.message: You have exhausted your 14-day free trial. To continue to the app, you must upgrade your account to a higher subscription. If you think this is a mistake, please contact customer support.
upgrade.moreProjectsMessage: Your {{ translatedAccountType }} has reached its maximum project limit, to continue creating more try to make room or subscribe to a higher plan.
upgrade.moreDatabasesMessage: Your {{ translatedAccountType }} has reached its maximum database limit, to continue creating more try to make room or subscribe to a higher plan.
upgrade.databasesTrialAccount: The trial account does not have access to databases, if you wish, you can subscribe to a higher plan.
